English author (1840-1928): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Hardy He was in the news in 1912 when his first wife, Emma Lavinia Gifford, died; in 1913 for publishing a collection of mourning poems; and in 1914 for marrying his second wife, the much younger Florence Emily Dugdale.
